welcome_new_user: Welcome! Please choose how to proceed:
welcome_registered: Welcome as a registered member to the Financial Services System
guest_mode_info: You can browse the system, but cannot perform financial transactions or submit complaints. For full access, please register.
registration_complete: Registration completed successfully! Your customer code is: {code}
account_blocked: Your account has been blocked. Please contact support.
request_submitted: Your request has been submitted successfully and is under review
complaint_submitted: Your complaint has been submitted successfully and will be answered soon
guest_restriction: Sorry, this feature is available for registered members only. Please register first.
error: An error occurred, please try again
unauthorized: You are not authorized to access this feature
permission_denied: You do not have permission to perform this action
support_info:

enter_amount_instruction: Please enter the amount in numbers only. Example: 100.50
invalid_amount_format: Invalid amount format. Please enter a valid number.
amount_too_small: Amount is too small. Minimum is {min_amount}
amount_too_large: Amount is too large. Maximum is {max_amount}
enter_reference_instruction: Please enter the reference number or transaction ID:
